sentences.sContent: We now dissolve everything in a mixture of hydrochloric acid at 35% and chlorine bleach (sodium hypochlorite) at 5%, in a proportion of 2 to 1.
sentences.sContent_eng: We now dissolve everything in a mixture of hydrochloric acid at 35% and chlorine bleach (sodium hypochlorite) at 5%, in a proportion of 2 to 1.
sentences.sCn: 现在我们用35%的盐酸和5%的漂白剂（次氯酸钠）把所有金属溶解。 盐酸和次氯酸钠的比例为2：1。
